extendedInfo.description: One Legacy Radio is unlike any Islamic application you've experienced !Talk Radio: We broadcast daily Talk radio shows from American Muslim writers, thinkers scholars and professionals. From Relationships, Youth, Love, Sex, Health and Wellbeing, Civil Rights, World Affairs, Politics, Economics, Activism,  and of course re-known scholars and guests. +++Now you can follow your favorite show via stream or on-demand+++   Lectures Radio: Listen to a massive collection of Islamic lectures covering almost every subject related to Islam you can think of -  from Tafseer of the Quran, Islamic History, Fiqh, Seerah, Spirituality in Islam, connecting with our religion in  the modern era.Quran Radio: We air a large selection of different Quran Reciters from around the globe, performed by well known Quran Recites from the West and the Muslim countries, as well and up new and up and Quran Reciters.Nahsheed and Beats Radio: Hourly rotations between Maher Zain, Sami Yusuf, and the biggest Islamic Nahsheed pop artists followed  by the best of American and British Islamic Conscious Rap, spoken word artists, to Islamic Nahsheeds and Beats from around the World.  We broadcast the work of amazing artists, delivering an interesting mix of Nahsheeds and inspiring compilations.Whether you tune in from the East or the West, be it New Dehli or New York City you will love One Legacy Radio . With diverse content covering Islamic lifestyle - spiritual, social, educational, arts and entertainment,  the station is a pioneering success with global popularity. Our application player uniquely allows you to choose from one of  the four islamic content stream, catering to your mood, be it Talk Radio, Quranic Recitation, Islamic Lectures, and Islamic Beats.

reviews.title: Bilal
reviews.comment: One of the best apps, Awesome love it, perfect on htc desire hd, however u cant download nor listen to lectures, nothing happens when click on listen, just radio working only on wifi, no 3g working
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Doesn\'t work
reviews.comment: Used to love listening to the radio even though it would cut out a lot.  Now the app doesn\'t even work at all on my s3 whether on 4g or wifi.
reviews.author: Zunera Ghaznavi

reviews.comment: Super What happened to one legacy\'? It\'s not working for several months.I thought it\'s my fault first. But complaints are there in site also. But no response from team also\tWhat happened to one legacy\'? It\'s not working for several months.I thought it\'s my fault first. But complaints are there in site also. But no response from team also
reviews.author: Rafi.A Mohammed

reviews.title: Ads inappropriate
reviews.comment: Good content, stations that work buffer very quickly, don\'t like seeing dating ads popping up with pictures of women, doesn\'t really suit the content. Needs a sleep timer as well, needs notification bar icon when minimised.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Great app but
reviews.comment: Alhumdulilah it is a wonderful app. I can listen and stream lectures and talk radio but the app says there\'s a streaming error when I try to stream Quran recitation and won\'t stream music. Please fix these issues and it would be the best Islamic app on the market
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Fav Show
reviews.comment: My favorite show on the radio is In The Mix w/ dj Halal & the Bird man, but they haven\'t had a new show all this year, or at least I haven\'t heard. I hope they come back with new shows dealing with current issues. It really is a Great show!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: I did not like this app
reviews.comment: Only talks and lectures work on my Xperia s when quran and beats are unavailable. Furthermore, the talks and lectures were average.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Two stations don\'t work
reviews.comment: The lecture and the beats stations do not work. Please fix ASAP I loved the lectures !:(
